{{Wired embedded system |brand=Gateworks |model=Ventana GW5100 |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date= |manuf_country=USA |is_manuf=Yes |availability= |type=single-board computer, wired embedded board |fcc_id= |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=8-42 |pwr_amp= |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_poe=at |cpu1_brand=Freescale Semiconductor |cpu1_model=i.MX6 |cpu1_cspeed=800 |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=256 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |ram1=512 |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, Mini PCle, Micro SD |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |addl_chips= |flags=RTC w/ battery backup, HDMI out |stock_boot= |stock_os=Linux;;OpenWrt; |tp_firmware=Android |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui_eth= }} For a list of all currently documented '''Freescale''' chipsets with specifications, see '''[[Freescale]]'''. ---- {{TagLine|Ventana GW5100 Network Processor}} :[http://www.gateworks.com/product/item/ventana-gw5100-network-processor Product page]
The GW5100 features the [[Freescale]] i.MX6 Dual Core ARM Cortex-A9 SoC processor :operating at 800MHz, 512Mbytes of DDR3-1066 DRAM, and 256Mbytes of Flash.
Additional specifications, per '''Gateworks''''s site, follow... *Dimensions: [[Dimensions::35 mm x 100 mm x 13 mm]]
